title: The Lord Will Restore Covenant Israel
html: 2 Nephi 24:1. Israel set in their own land Perhaps another dual prophecy—King Cyrus of Persia will allow the Jews to return from Babylonian captivity in 537 B.C. (See "Event Four," p. 20); this may also refer to the latter-day gathering of Israel, in which modern covenant Israel will receive help from the Gentiles.
